artifactDefinition.businessDescription: This property set includes the Core Carbon Principles as outlined by the ICVCM determined by using the Integrity Council's Assessment Framework, which elaborates criteria for evaluating whether carbon credits and carbon-crediting programs reach a high-quality threshold.
artifactDefinition.businessExample: The CCPs define a threshold standard to ensure the integrity of the voluntary carbon market (VCM). The CCPs and the Assessment Framework have been developed in open dialogue with carbon-crediting programs and other stakeholders and are drawn from several sources. These principles include: Additionality, Mitigation Activity, No double counting, program governance, a registry, 3rd party validation and verification, robust quantification and SDG impacts and safeguards, with a transition towards net-zero goals.

dependencies.description: The co-benefit (SDG) is included in this property set.
The Mitigation Activity property set is included in this property set.
The ParisAgreementCompliant property set is included in this property set.
The Durability property set is included in this property set.
The Replacement property set is included in this property set.

influencedBySymbols.description: Roles should be used to control what accounts can update or modify property values.

properties.name: CoreCarbonPrinciples
properties.valueDescription: Contains the values for the principles.

outputParameters.name: CoreCarbonPrinciples
outputParameters.valueDescription: Returning the CoreCarbonPrinciples values - see control file ecological-claim.proto.

inputParameters.name: CoreCarbonPrinciples
inputParameters.valueDescription: Set the EcologicalProjectInfo values - see control file ecological-project-info.proto.

outputParameters.name: Confirmation
outputParameters.valueDescription: Returning the value of the set request.

properties.name: CoreCarbonPrinciples
properties.valueDescription: Contains the values for the CoreCarbonPrinciples.

properties.name: AssetId
properties.valueDescription: typically the issuing verifiers master id or serial number that resides on their registry system. Could be empty or the same as the token's id if not needed.

properties.name: IssuanceDate
properties.valueDescription: Refers to the date of issuance usually in the DD/MM/YYYY or MM/DD/YYYY.

properties.name: Vintage
properties.valueDescription: Refers to the year that the emissions reduction or ecological benefit took place //The principle that a project activity is additional if the resulting emission reductions are lower than what would have happened in the absence of the activity.

properties.name: GenerationType
properties.valueDescription: An ecological product can be a generated value based on verified historical results or ex-ante, meaning a predicted result. See the enum type in ecological-asset.proto for example.

properties.name: QualityStandard
properties.valueDescription: The quality standard used to determine and issue a ecological benefit token. These can be a voluntary or compliance/regulatory standard. See the ecological-asset.proto enum for an example.

reference.referenceNotes: Mitigation Activity the CCP is based off of.

properties.name: MitigationActivity
properties.valueDescription: Contains the values for the MitigationActivity as outlined in the mitigation-activity.proto.

propertyInvocations.name: GetMitigationActivity
propertyInvocations.description: Request the list of the MitigationActivity.

outputParameters.name: Category
outputParameters.valueDescription: Returning the category.

outputParameters.name: Method
outputParameters.valueDescription: Returning method.

propertyInvocations.name: SetMitigationActivity
propertyInvocations.description: Set the values for the property, only the Issue should be able to set this property.

inputParameters.name: Category
inputParameters.valueDescription: The Category - either Reduction or Removal.

inputParameters.name: Method
inputParameters.valueDescription: The Method - either Natural or Technology.

outputParameters.name: Confirmation
outputParameters.valueDescription: Returning the MitigationActivity of the set request.

properties.name: MitigationActivity
properties.valueDescription: Contains the SetMitigationActivity property values.

properties.name: Category
properties.valueDescription: Reduction or Removal

properties.name: Method
properties.valueDescription: Biological or Technological or Both

reference.referenceNotes: Durability of the credit, also called permanence.

properties.name: Durability
properties.valueDescription: Contains the values of durability.

outputParameters.name: Durability
outputParameters.valueDescription: Returning the Durability values - see control file durability.proto.

inputParameters.name: Durability
inputParameters.valueDescription: Set the Durability values - see control file durability.proto.

outputParameters.name: Confirmation
outputParameters.valueDescription: Returning the value of the set request.

properties.name: Durability
properties.valueDescription: Contains the values for Durability.

properties.name: Storage
properties.valueDescription: A selection from a list of storage types, ex. see the durability.proto enumeration of types.

properties.name: Years
properties.valueDescription: The length in years the carbon is expected to be sequestered for.

properties.name: Degradable
properties.valueDescription: If or when degradation of the sequestration can be expected.

properties.name: Percentage
properties.valueDescription: A 0 = no degradation possible, 100 = all sequestered should be expected to be released

properties.name: Factor
properties.valueDescription: The factor of 25 = .25 per year if linear or exponential starts at 25% of durability years.

properties.name: DegradationType
properties.valueDescription: A selection from a list of degradation types, ex. see the durability.proto enumeration of types.

properties.name: ReversalMitigation
properties.valueDescription: For removals the risk of reversal needs to be defined and a mitigation strategy should be identified.

properties.name: ReversalRisk
properties.valueDescription: A selection from durability.proto - low, mid, high

properties.name: DurabilityInsuranceType
properties.valueDescription: A selection from durability.proto

properties.name: InsuranceProvider
properties.valueDescription: A selection from durability.proto

reference.referenceNotes: OPTIONAL - Verified Link Property Set for this Durability Insurance Policy.

properties.name: VerifiedLink
properties.valueDescription: Contains a Verified Link to the insurance policy.

outputParameters.name: VerifiedLink
outputParameters.valueDescription: Returning the Verified Link for insurance policy.

propertyInvocations.name: SetVerifiedLink
propertyInvocations.description: Set the link for the insurance policy.

inputParameters.name: VerifiedLink
inputParameters.valueDescription: The Verified Link of the insurance policy.

outputParameters.name: Confirmation
outputParameters.valueDescription: Returning a confirmation for the set request.

reference.referenceNotes: Replacement property set if the asset is a replacement for a revoked asset in the case of a reversal action.

properties.name: Replacement
properties.valueDescription: Contains the Id, Date and notes about the replacement.

outputParameters.name: Replacement
outputParameters.valueDescription: Returning the Replacement data.

propertyInvocations.name: SetReplacement
propertyInvocations.description: Only the issuer can set the Issued Amount and is typically done during construction not after creation. A role check for issuer is required for invocation.

inputParameters.name: ReplacesId
inputParameters.valueDescription: Set the Id of the token being replaced.

inputParameters.name: ReplacementNotes
inputParameters.valueDescription: Record notes about why the token is being replaced.

outputParameters.name: Confirmation
outputParameters.valueDescription: Returning the value of the set request.

properties.name: Adjustment
properties.valueDescription: Contains the adjustment from the issuer.

properties.name: ReplacesId
properties.valueDescription: Contains the id of the token it is replacing.

properties.name: ReplacementDate
properties.valueDescription: Contains the date the adjustment or replacement made by issuer.

properties.name: ReplacementNotes
properties.valueDescription: Contains notes on why the replacement or adjustment is needed.

properties.name: PACompliance
properties.valueDescription: Contains the values for the properties.

outputParameters.name: PACompliance
outputParameters.valueDescription: Returning the PACompliance values - see control file paris-agreement-compliance.proto.

inputParameters.name: PACompliance
inputParameters.valueDescription: Set the PACompliance values - see control file paris-agreement-compliance.proto.

outputParameters.name: Confirmation
outputParameters.valueDescription: Returning the value of the set request.

properties.name: CA
properties.valueDescription: Contains the value for the Corresponding Adjustment.

properties.name: CorrespondingAdjustment
properties.valueDescription: Either - None, ParisAgreementCompliant or ParisAgreementPendingCompliance

reference.referenceNotes: Verified Link Property Set for an optional Letter of Approval.

properties.name: LetterOfApproval
properties.valueDescription: Contains a Verified Link to the Letter Of Approval.

outputParameters.name: VerifiedLink
outputParameters.valueDescription: Returning the Verified Link for project.

propertyInvocations.name: SetLetterOfApproval
propertyInvocations.description: Set the letter of approval for the project.

inputParameters.name: VerifiedLink
inputParameters.valueDescription: The Verified Link type to add to the project.

outputParameters.name: Confirmation
outputParameters.valueDescription: Returning a confirmation for the set request.

reference.referenceNotes: Co-benefits property set to indicate which SDGs are covered by the CCP.

properties.name: CoBenefit
properties.valueDescription: Contains the values for the co-benefit.

outputParameters.name: CoBenefit
outputParameters.valueDescription: Returning the CoBenefit values - see control file co-benefit.proto.

inputParameters.name: CoBenefit
inputParameters.valueDescription: Set the CoBenefit values - see control file co-benefit.proto.

outputParameters.name: Confirmation
outputParameters.valueDescription: Returning the value of the set request.

propertyInvocations.name: AddCoBenefit
propertyInvocations.description: Add a co-benefit to the asset.

inputParameters.name: CoBenefit
inputParameters.valueDescription: The CoBenefit type to add to the asset.

outputParameters.name: Confirmation
outputParameters.valueDescription: Returning a confirmation for the add request.

propertyInvocations.name: RemoveCoBenefit
propertyInvocations.description: Remove a co-benefit to the asset.

inputParameters.name: CoBenefit
inputParameters.valueDescription: The CoBenefit type to remove to the asset.

outputParameters.name: Confirmation
outputParameters.valueDescription: Returning a confirmation for the remove request.

properties.name: CoBenefit
properties.valueDescription: Contains the values for the CoBenefit.

properties.name: BenefitCategory
properties.valueDescription: A selection from a list of categories, ex. see the co-benefit.proto enumeration of BenefitCategories.

properties.name: Description
properties.valueDescription: A description of the co-benefit that is not captured via the category.

properties.name: RatingScore
properties.valueDescription: A placeholder for some kind of rating or scoring of the relative co-benefit.

reference.referenceNotes: Co-benefits property set for the adaptation of the token's co-benefits consistent with the host country’s priorities, consistent with the provisions under Article 7.1 of the Paris Agreement.

properties.name: CoBenefit
properties.valueDescription: Contains the values for the co-benefit.

outputParameters.name: CoBenefit
outputParameters.valueDescription: Returning the CoBenefit values - see control file co-benefit.proto.

inputParameters.name: CoBenefit
inputParameters.valueDescription: Set the CoBenefit values - see control file co-benefit.proto.

outputParameters.name: Confirmation
outputParameters.valueDescription: Returning the value of the set request.

propertyInvocations.name: AddCoBenefit
propertyInvocations.description: Add a co-benefit to the asset.

inputParameters.name: CoBenefit
inputParameters.valueDescription: The CoBenefit type to add to the asset.

outputParameters.name: Confirmation
outputParameters.valueDescription: Returning a confirmation for the add request.

propertyInvocations.name: RemoveCoBenefit
propertyInvocations.description: Remove a co-benefit to the asset.

inputParameters.name: CoBenefit
inputParameters.valueDescription: The CoBenefit type to remove to the asset.

outputParameters.name: Confirmation
outputParameters.valueDescription: Returning a confirmation for the remove request.

properties.valueDescription: Contains the values for the CoBenefit.

properties.name: BenefitCategory
properties.valueDescription: A selection from a list of categories, ex. see the co-benefit.proto enumeration of BenefitCategories.
